7374
7375int FFmpeg_Transcoder::get_hw_omx_encoder_name(AVCodecID codec_id, std::string *codec_name) const
7376{
7377 int ret = 0;
7383 switch (codec_id)
7384 {
7385 case AV_CODEC_ID_H264:
7386 {
7387 *codec_name = "h264_omx";
7388 break;
7389 }
7390 default:
7391 {
7392 ret = AVERROR_DECODER_NOT_FOUND;
7393 break;
7394 }
7395 }
7396
7397 return ret;
7398}
7399
7400int FFmpeg_Transcoder::get_hw_v4l2m2m_encoder_name(AVCodecID codec_id, std::string *codec_name) const
7401{
7402 int ret = 0;
7412 switch (codec_id)
7413 {
7414 case AV_CODEC_ID_H263:
7415 {
7416 *codec_name = "h263_v4l2m2m";
7417 break;
7418 }
7419 case AV_CODEC_ID_H264:
7420 {
7421 *codec_name = "h264_v4l2m2m";
7422 break;
7423 }
7424 case AV_CODEC_ID_H265:
7425 {
7426 *codec_name = "hevc_v4l2m2m";
7427 break;
7428 }
7429 case AV_CODEC_ID_MPEG4:
7430 {
7431 *codec_name = "mpeg4_v4l2m2m";
7432 break;
7433 }
7434 case AV_CODEC_ID_VP8:
7435 {
7436 *codec_name = "vp8_v4l2m2m";
7437 break;
7438 }
7439 default:
7440 {
7441 ret = AVERROR_DECODER_NOT_FOUND;
7442 break;
7443 }
7444 }
7445
7446 return ret;
7447}
7448
7449AVPixelFormat FFmpeg_Transcoder::find_sw_fmt_by_hw_type(AVHWDeviceType type)
7450{
7451 DEVICETYPE_MAP::const_iterator it = m_devicetype_map.find(type);
7452
7453 if (it == m_devicetype_map.cend())
7454 {
7455 return AV_PIX_FMT_NONE;
7456 }
7457
7458 return it->second;
7459}
7460
7461void FFmpeg_Transcoder::get_pix_formats(AVPixelFormat *in_pix_fmt, AVPixelFormat *out_pix_fmt, AVCodecContext* output_codec_ctx) const
7462{
7463 *in_pix_fmt = static_cast<AVPixelFormat>(m_in.m_video.m_stream->codecpar->format);
7464
7465 if (m_hwaccel_enable_dec_buffering)
7466 {
7467 *in_pix_fmt = find_sw_fmt_by_hw_type(params.m_hwaccel_dec_device_type);
7468 }
7469
7470 if (output_codec_ctx == nullptr)
7471 {
7472 output_codec_ctx = m_out.m_video.m_codec_ctx.get();
7473 }
7474
7475 // Fail safe: If output_codec_ctx is NULL, set to something common (AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P is widely used)
7476 *out_pix_fmt = (output_codec_ctx != nullptr) ? output_codec_ctx->pix_fmt : AV_PIX_FMT_YUV420P;
7477
7478 if (*in_pix_fmt == AV_PIX_FMT_NONE)
7479 {
7480 // If input's stream pixel format is unknown, use same as output (may not work but at least will not crash FFmpeg)
7481 *in_pix_fmt = *out_pix_fmt;
7482 }
7483
7484 // If hardware acceleration is enabled, e.g., output_codec_ctx->pix_fmt is AV_PIX_FMT_VAAPI
7485 // but the format actually is AV_PIX_FMT_NV12 so we use the correct value from sw_format in
7486 // the hardware frames context.
7487 if (m_hwaccel_enable_enc_buffering &&
7488 output_codec_ctx != nullptr &&
7489 output_codec_ctx->hw_frames_ctx != nullptr &&
7490 output_codec_ctx->hw_frames_ctx->data != nullptr)
7491 {
7492 *out_pix_fmt = reinterpret_cast<AVHWFramesContext*>(output_codec_ctx->hw_frames_ctx->data)->sw_format;
7493 }
7494}
7495
7496uint32_t FFmpeg_Transcoder::get_next_segment(int64_t pos) const
7497{
7498 return (static_cast<uint32_t>(pos / params.m_segment_duration + 1));
7499}
7500
7501bool FFmpeg_Transcoder::goto_next_segment(uint32_t next_segment) const
7502{
7503 return (next_segment == m_current_segment + 1 && next_segment <= m_virtualfile->get_segment_count());
7504}
7505
7506bool FFmpeg_Transcoder::is_audio_stream(int stream_idx) const
7507{
7508 return (stream_exists(stream_idx) && stream_idx == m_in.m_audio.m_stream_idx);
7509}
7510
7511bool FFmpeg_Transcoder::is_video_stream(int stream_idx) const
7512{
7513 return (stream_exists(stream_idx) && stream_idx == m_in.m_video.m_stream_idx);
7514}
7515
7516bool FFmpeg_Transcoder::is_subtitle_stream(int stream_idx) const
7517{
7518 StreamRef_map::const_iterator it = m_in.m_subtitle.find(stream_idx);
7519
7520 return (it != m_in.m_subtitle.cend());
7521}
7522
7523FFmpeg_Transcoder::StreamRef * FFmpeg_Transcoder::get_out_subtitle_stream(int stream_idx)
7524{
7525 StreamRef_map::iterator it = m_out.m_subtitle.find(stream_idx);
7526
7527 if (it == m_out.m_subtitle.end())
7528 {
7529 return nullptr;
7530 }
7531
7532 return &it->second;
7533}
7534
7535bool FFmpeg_Transcoder::stream_exists(int stream_idx) const
7536{
7537 return (stream_idx != INVALID_STREAM);
7538}
7539
7540void FFmpeg_Transcoder::add_stream_map(int in_stream_idx, int out_stream_idx)
7541{
7542 if (in_stream_idx != INVALID_STREAM)
7543 {
7544 m_stream_map.insert(std::make_pair(in_stream_idx, out_stream_idx));
7545 }
7546}
7547
7548int FFmpeg_Transcoder::map_in_to_out_stream(int in_stream_idx) const
7549{
7550 STREAM_MAP::const_iterator it = m_stream_map.find(in_stream_idx);
7551
7552 if (it == m_stream_map.cend())
7553 {
7554 return INVALID_STREAM;
7555 }
7556
7557 return (it->second);
7558}
7559
7560inline int FFmpeg_Transcoder::foreach_subtitle_file(const std::string& search_path, const std::regex& regex, int depth, const std::function<int (const std::string &, const std::optional<std::string> &)> &f)
7561{
7562 int ret = 0;
7563
7564 try
7565 {
7566 const std::filesystem::directory_iterator end;
7567 for (std::filesystem::directory_iterator iter{ search_path }; iter != end && ret == 0; iter++)
7568 {
7569 const std::string subtitle_filename(iter->path().filename().string());
7570 if (std::filesystem::is_regular_file(*iter))
7571 {
7572 if (std::regex_match(subtitle_filename, regex))
7573 {
7574 std::smatch res;
7575 if (std::regex_search(subtitle_filename.cbegin(), subtitle_filename.cend(), res, regex))
7576 {
7577 if (res[2].length())
7578 {
7579 ret = f(iter->path().string(), res[2]);
7580 }
7581 else
7582 {
7583 ret = f(iter->path().string(), std::nullopt);
7584 }
7585 }
7586 }
7587 }
7588 else if (std::filesystem::is_directory(*iter) && depth > 0)
7589 {
7590 ret = foreach_subtitle_file(iter->path().string(), regex, depth - 1, f);
7591 }
7592 }
7593 }
7594 catch (std::filesystem::filesystem_error& e)
7595 {
7596 ret = AVERROR(e.code().value());
7597 Logging::error(filename(), "Could not open directory '%1' (error '%2').", search_path.c_str(), ffmpeg_geterror(ret).c_str());
7598 }
7599 catch (std::bad_alloc & e)
7600 {
7601 ret = AVERROR(ENOMEM);
7602 Logging::error(filename(), "Could not open directory '%1' (error '%2').", search_path.c_str(), ffmpeg_geterror(ret).c_str());
7603 }
7604
7605 return ret;
7606}
7607
7608int FFmpeg_Transcoder::read_packet(void *opaque, uint8_t *buf, int buf_size)
7609{
7610 BUFFER_DATA *bd = static_cast<BUFFER_DATA *>(opaque);
7611 buf_size = FFMIN(buf_size, static_cast<int>(bd->size));
7612
7613 if (!buf_size)
7614 {
7615 return AVERROR_EOF;
7616 }
7617
7618 /* copy internal buffer data to buf */
7619 std::memcpy(buf, bd->ptr, static_cast<size_t>(buf_size));
7620 bd->ptr += buf_size;
7621 bd->size -= static_cast<size_t>(buf_size);
7622
7623 return buf_size;
7624}
7625
7626int FFmpeg_Transcoder::add_external_subtitle_stream(const std::string & subtitle_file, const std::optional<std::string> & language)
7627{
7628 AVFormatContext *format_ctx = nullptr;
7629 AVIOContext *avio_ctx = nullptr;
7630 uint8_t *buffer = nullptr;
7631 size_t buffer_size;
7632 int ret = 0;
7633
7634 if (language)
7635 {
7636 Logging::debug(filename(), "Adding external subtitle stream: %1 [%2]", subtitle_file.c_str(), language->c_str());
7637 }
7638 else
7639 {
7640 Logging::debug(filename(), "Adding external subtitle stream: %1", subtitle_file.c_str());
7641 }
7642
7643 try
7644 {
7645 uint8_t *avio_ctx_buffer = nullptr;
7646 int avio_ctx_buffer_size = 4096;
7647 BUFFER_DATA bd = { nullptr, 0 };
7648
7649 // slurp file content into buffer
7650 ret = av_file_map(subtitle_file.c_str(), &buffer, &buffer_size, 0, nullptr);
7651 if (ret < 0)
7652 {
7653 throw ret;
7654 }
7655
7656 // fill opaque structure used by the AVIOContext read callback
7657 bd.ptr = buffer;
7658 bd.size = buffer_size;
7659
7660 format_ctx = avformat_alloc_context();
7661 if (format_ctx == nullptr)
7662 {
7663 throw AVERROR(ENOMEM);
7664 }
7665
7666 avio_ctx_buffer = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t *>(av_malloc(static_cast<size_t>(avio_ctx_buffer_size)));
7667 if (avio_ctx_buffer == nullptr)
7668 {
7669 throw AVERROR(ENOMEM);
7670 }
7671
7672 avio_ctx = avio_alloc_context(avio_ctx_buffer, avio_ctx_buffer_size, 0, &bd, &read_packet, nullptr, nullptr);
7673 if (avio_ctx == nullptr)
7674 {
7675 throw AVERROR(ENOMEM);
7676 }
7677 format_ctx->pb = avio_ctx;
7678
7679 ret = avformat_open_input(&format_ctx, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
7680 if (ret < 0)
7681 {
7682 Logging::error(filename(), "Could not open input file (error '%1').", ffmpeg_geterror(ret).c_str());
7683 throw ret;
7684 }
7685
7686 ret = avformat_find_stream_info(format_ctx, nullptr);
7687 if (ret < 0)
7688 {
7689 Logging::error(filename(), "Could not find stream info (error '%1').", ffmpeg_geterror(ret).c_str());
7690 throw ret;
7691 }
7692
7693 //av_dump_format(format_ctx, 0, subtitle_file.c_str(), 0);
7694
7695 AVCodecContext * codec_ctx = nullptr;
7696 int stream_idx = INVALID_STREAM;
7697
7698 ret = open_bestmatch_decoder(format_ctx, &codec_ctx, &stream_idx, AVMEDIA_TYPE_SUBTITLE);
7699 if (ret < 0 && ret != AVERROR_STREAM_NOT_FOUND) // AVERROR_STREAM_NOT_FOUND is not an error
7700 {
7701 Logging::error(filename(), "Failed to open video codec (error '%1').", ffmpeg_geterror(ret).c_str());
7702 throw ret;
7703 }
7704
7705 if (ret != AVERROR_STREAM_NOT_FOUND)
7706 {
7707 AVCodecID codec_id = m_current_format->subtitle_codec(codec_ctx->codec_id); // Get matching output codec
7708
7709 if (codec_id != AV_CODEC_ID_NONE)
7710 {
7711 StreamRef input_streamref;
7712
7713 codec_ctx->pkt_timebase = codec_ctx->time_base = format_ctx->streams[0]->time_base;
7714
7715 // We have a subtitle stream
7716 input_streamref.set_codec_ctx(codec_ctx);
7717 input_streamref.m_stream = format_ctx->streams[0];
7718 input_streamref.m_stream_idx = INVALID_STREAM;
7719
7720 //m_active_stream_msk |= FFMPEGFS_SUBTITLE;
7721
7722 ret = add_subtitle_stream(codec_id, input_streamref, language);
7723 if (ret < 0)
7724 {
7725 throw ret;
7726 }
7727
7728 AVPacket pkt;
7729 int output_stream_index = ret;
7730 // Read one frame from the input file into a temporary packet.
7731 while ((ret = av_read_frame(format_ctx, &pkt)) == 0)
7732 {
7733 int decoded;
7734 ret = decode_subtitle(codec_ctx, &pkt, &decoded, output_stream_index);
7735 if (ret < 0)
7736 {
7737 throw ret;
7738 }
7739 }
7740 }
7741 }
7742
7743 if (ret == AVERROR_EOF)
7744 {
7745 ret = 0;
7746 }
7747 }
7748 catch (int _ret)
7749 {
7750 ret = _ret;
7751 }
7752
7753 avformat_close_input(&format_ctx);
7754
7755 // note: the internal buffer could have changed, and be != avio_ctx_buffer
7756 if (avio_ctx != nullptr)
7757 {
7758 av_freep(&avio_ctx->buffer);
7759 }
7760
7761 avio_context_free(&avio_ctx);
7762
7763 av_file_unmap(buffer, buffer_size);
7764
7765 return ret;
7766}
7767
7768int FFmpeg_Transcoder::add_external_subtitle_streams()
7769{
7770 int ret;
7771
7772 try
7773 {
7774 std::filesystem::path file(filename());
7775 std::string stem(file.stem().string());
7776
7777 // Escape characters that are meaningful to regexp.
7778 regex_escape(&stem);
7779
7780 std::string regex_string("^(" + stem + "[.])(.*)([.]srt|[.]vtt)|^(" + stem + ")([.]srt|[.]vtt)"); // filename.srt/vtt or filename.lang.srt/vtt
7781 std::regex regex(regex_string, std::regex::ECMAScript);
7782
7783 //ret = foreach_subtitle_file(
7784 // file.parent_path(),
7785 // regex,
7786 // 0,
7787 // std::bind(&FFmpeg_Transcoder::add_external_subtitle_stream, this, std::placeholders::_1, std::placeholders::_2));
7788
7789 // clang-tidy now recommends a lambda
7790 ret = foreach_subtitle_file(
7791 file.parent_path().string(),
7792 regex,
7793 0,
7794 [this](const std::string & subtitle_file, const std::optional<std::string> & language)
7795 {
7796 add_external_subtitle_stream(std::forward<decltype(subtitle_file)>(subtitle_file), std::forward<decltype(language)>(language));
7797 return 0;
7798 });
7799
7800 // Ugly, but a lambda would also be possible
7801 //ret = foreach_subtitle_file(
7802 // file.parent_path(),
7803 // regex,
7804 // 0,
7805 // [this](const std::string & subtitle_file, const std::optional<std::string> & language)
7806 //{
7807 // if (language)
7808 // {
7809 // Logging::error(filename(), "[%1] %2", language->c_str(), subtitle_file.c_str());
7810 // }
7811 // else
7812 // {
7813 // Logging::error(filename(), "%1", subtitle_file.c_str());
7814 // }
7815 // return 0;
7816 //});
7817 }
7818 catch (std::regex_error & e)
7819 {
7820 ret = 0; // Ignore error
7821 Logging::error(filename(), "INTERNAL ERROR: FFmpeg_Transcoder::add_external_subtitle_streams()! Unable to create reg exp: %1", e.what());
7822 }
7823
7824 return ret;
7825}
7826
7827int64_t FFmpeg_Transcoder::pts() const
7828{
7829 MULTIFRAME_MAP::const_reverse_iterator it = m_frame_map.crbegin();
7830
7831 if (it != m_frame_map.crend())
7832 {
7833 return it->first;
7834 }
7835 else
7836 {
7837 return 0;
7838 }
7839}
7840
7841uint32_t FFmpeg_Transcoder::last_seek_frame_no() const
7842{
7843 return m_last_seek_frame_no;
7844}
